br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route

Interface Router

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRouter

    public interface Router
    Handles different rules in order to translate urls into Resource methods.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Route route)
      Add a new Route to this Router
      EnumSet<HttpMethod> allowedMethodsFor(String uri) 
      List<Route> allRoutes()
      Returns a list with all routes
      RouteBuilder builderFor(String uri) 
      ResourceMethod parse(String uri, HttpMethod method, MutableRequest request)
      Find a ResourceMethod that can handle this request.
      <T> String urlFor(Class<T> type, Method method, Object... params)
      Retrieves a single url to access the desired method.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Route route)
        Add a new Route to this Router
        Parameters:
        route - The route

      • parse

        ResourceMethod parse(String uri,
                   HttpMethod method,
                   MutableRequest request)
                     throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                            MethodNotAllowedException,
                            IllegalStateException
        Find a ResourceMethod that can handle this request.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when there is no ResourceMethod that can handle this request
        MethodNotAllowedException - when there is no ResourceMethod that can handle given URI with given HttpMethod
        IllegalStateException - when more than one ResourceMethod can handle this request.

      • urlFor

        <T> String urlFor(Class<T> type,
                Method method,
                Object... params)
        Retrieves a single url to access the desired method.

      • allRoutes

        List<Route> allRoutes()
        Returns a list with all routes

      • builderFor

        RouteBuilder builderFor(String uri)

      • allowedMethodsFor
